title: Sam Faiers poses with son Paul and shares glimpse inside Dubai family holiday
text:

Sam Faiers has given fans a glimpse inside her latest luxury family holiday.

The reality star and hands on mum-of-two has jetted off to Dubai with partner Paul and their two children Paul and Rosie.

The Faiers clan have checked into five star hotel The One and Only Royal Mirage, which boasts a spa and a private beach.

Sam, 28, revealed she's been making the most of some quality time with her kids as she took them for a dip in the pool.

(Image: Instagram)

Four-year-old son Paul seemed like a total natural as he dived under the water.

Afterwards, Sam shared a happy snap of her cuddled up to her boy, telling him in the caption: "You’ve been coming here since you was in mummy’s tummy always making special memories."

Not leaving daughter Rosie out, Sam also shared a snap of the tot chilling out in the sunshine.

One-year-old Rosie was seen pulling some hilarious poses on the grass with palm trees and Dubai's famous skyscrapers behind her.

(Image: Instagram)

Sam joked that her little girl insisted on bring her favourite handbag down the pool as she won't go anywhere without it.

But Rosie managed to stay away from her bag long enough to join big brother Paul for a splash in the water.

"Well done Paul for teaching Rosie to jump in (with no float) and swim to the steps," said Sam about her water babies.

(Image: Instagram)

It wasn't just about the kids though as Sam and Paul Senior also took time out to enjoy a romantic date night just the two of them.

For their evening out, Sam slipped into a lime green midi dress that featured a slashed to the thigh split to show off the most of her golden tan.

The latest trip away comes just two weeks after Sam and Paul holidayed in Italy.

The couple headed off to Venice for their first trip abroad alone after having kids.
description: The Mummy Diaries star has taken her brood to the United Arab Emirates for another luxury family holiday
